Text:
Okay.... so I missed the "hardcoded subs" part of the description, my bad.

Video quality looks good, but it stutters all the way through. Every third frame is repeated for most of the movie, although there appears to be a few sections which are "good". It's not my decoder or media player, the video is only Xvid and it's progressive. Seems it was badly de-interlaced or IVTC'd.... or something don't fully understand.

Unless you really, really need hardcoded dutch subs and you can't find them anywhere else, and you don't mind watching a movie which gives you a headache, this torrent is for you.

Otherwise, it's a waste of time.

------------------------------------------
